review: Plug it in and get out of the way!!!
author: Robert C. Johnson

review: It will be perfect when HBOGo is added!
author: Brooke B.

review: I have only had it a few days but I am impressed with how easy it was to set up and use. I don't have a wii or blue ray player to watch Netflix so this was a perfect simple solution for my simple tv watching lifestyle. I am sure it can do more than I will use it for but for the price and ease its perfect!
author: Chelsea Toone

review: Great product took less than 5 minutes to install.
author: DAE

review: I loved it. So much better than Chromecast. Really worth buying.
author: sarvagya

review: I love the Firestick! So easy to use, works great.
author: kimber

review: It's easy to use and doesn't interfere with clarity.
author: Florence Jacobson

review: Very easy to install. Quality seems to be good. Tutorial was very helpful.
author: joanlucy

review: Totally in love with this stick!! Going to make my vacation less boring at night when relaxing!!! 👍👍
